description.full: The longest running Major League Baseball franchise returns to the virtual diamond with MLB 2K12 from 2K Sports. Demo the game featuring advanced pitching & hitting controls, detailed player tendencies & scouting reports, and immersive game modes for any level of fan. MLB 2K12 is the only game you'll need this season, available March 6, 2012.
